article:
'Hundred' usually refers to the number 100

It may also refer to:

* Hundred (word), historically a number not necessarily 100
* Hundred (county subdivision), an administrative division
* Hundred, West Virginia
* "Hundred", a song in the album [[How to Save a Life]] by The Fray
* Hundred, the name of the hundredth episode of [[One Tree Hill (TV series)]],
  named after The Fray's song
